subject: On-line generic store
body:
Dear valued member.
Don't miss our huge Spring Sale - up to 20% off the price for qualitative generic Canadian drugs.
MyCanadianPharmacy offers you a perfect match of quality and price - Canadian drugs. Being as effective as the products of major USA pharmaceutical companies, Canadian drugs are much cheaper. That's a deal you wouldn't waste, would you?
Hurry up to get the best of Canadian pharmaceutical industry.http://knewpush.hk

Sincerely yours,Frankie Covington
